bibl.title: People of the Red Sea. Proceedings of Red Sea Project II Held in the British Museum, October 2004. (Society for Arabian Studies Monographs. 3 = BAR International Series. 1395.)
bibl.note: 15 communications. - Part I. Peoples of the Red Sea in Ancient Times. - Part II. Peoples of the Red Sea in More Recent Times. - Pp. v: J.C.M.S., Introduction; 167-176: Index.

STARKEY Janet C.M. (Ed.), People of the Red Sea. Proceedings of Red Sea Project II Held in the British Museum, October 2004. (Society for Arabian Studies Monographs. 3 = BAR International Series. 1395.)
Oxford, Archaeopress, 2005, 4°, v-176 pp., tabl., graphiques, figg., cartes, plans. ISBN 1-84171-833-5. £30.
